thread.section_title: Disc Makers Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Disc Makers | discmakers.com
thread.title: Cat Toren
thread.title_full: Disc Makers reviewed by Cat Toren

author: Cat Toren
title: Cat Toren
text: My customer service representative was patient, kind and really knew his stuff. That put me at ease. Then when my order arrived on time and looked as expected, I was very happy. Would recommend. As a side note: my previous order had an error and they remade my order and shipped it within one day. That was very impressive.
